Extra functions

class simbo_class.extra_functions(en, nop, nu)¶

Methods

__init__(en, nop, nu)

Constructor (inherits from run_simbo class).

find_skips(maximum)

Finds spacing for optimal axis labels.

get_w_sw(en, nop, units)

Allows user to play around with W and S_w for Task 6.

plot_eq(all_wbolt, all_sw)

Plots equilibration data generated by run_eq.

plot_prob_temp(dist_sum, maxlev)

Calculates probability distribution and temperature and plots Boltzmann distribution and fit.

print_w_sw(all_wbolt, all_sw, start, end, units)

Prints W and S_w for selected interval and units.

Inherited methods

calc_Bolt_ent(distr)

Calculate Boltzmann entropy.

generate_levels()

Automatic generation of levels.
